徏字的基本解释

徏
zhì
古同“陟”。

徏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》竹力切，入職，知。］
亦作“徏1”。
(1)由低处向高处走。与“降”相对。
(2)远行，长途跋涉。
(3)提拔，升迁。
(4)谓登上帝位。
(5)升遐，升天。指帝王薨逝。
(6)高，高峻。
(7)重叠的山陵。
(8)入，进入。
(9)祭祀山岳。
(10)通“勑”。敬奉。
(11)通“騭”。牡马。
[②]［déㄉ］
［《集韻》的則切，入德，端。］
亦作“徏2”。
得，应验。

徏字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彳字部】　徏； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页367第10
【集韻】與陟同。

徏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
徏字的起名意思

暂无。

徏
Basic explanation of words
徏
zhì
Gu Tong "Zhi".
徏
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Guang Yun" Zhu Liqie, entry, knowledge. ]
Also known as "徏1".
(1) Walk from low to high. Contrast with "falling".
(2) Traveling long distances.
(3) Promotion and promotion.
(4) It means to ascend the throne of God.
(5) Ascend to heaven. Refers to the death of the emperor.
(6) High and steep.
(7) Overlapping mountain tombs.
(8) Enter, enter.
(9) Sacrifice to the mountains.
(10) Through "勑". Respect.
(11) Through "stall". Stallion.
[②]［déㄉ］
["Jiyun" is cut, enters the moral, and ends. ]
Also known as "徏2".
Got, fulfilled.
徏
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Jixia] [彳字部] 　徏; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 367-10
【Jiyun】Same as Zhi.
徏
